description: Try our easy to follow Zucchini Pasta With Leftover Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Zucchini Pasta With Leftover Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place pasta into serving bowls. Top with zucchini, chicken and capsicum. Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil and sprinkle with basil leaves. Serve immediately.
